metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the begin function is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evaluate to true if the interpreter properly supports the begin function.

criterion.comment: Test that the begin function is supported with a character value for the character attribute and a single string component that does not start with the character value specified in the character attribute.
Test that the begin function is supported with a character value for the character attribute and a single string component that starts with the character value specified in the character attribute.
Test that the begin function is supported with a string value for the character attribute and a single string component that does not start with the string value specified in the character attribute.
Test that the begin function is supported with a string value for the character attribute and a single string component that starts with the string value specified in the character attribute.

variable_test.comment: Test that the begin function is supported with a character value for the character attribute and a single string component that does not start with the character value specified in the character attribute.
Test that the begin function is supported with a character value for the character attribute and a single string component that starts with the character value specified in the character attribute.
Test that the begin function is supported with a string value for the character attribute and a single string component that does not start with the string value specified in the character attribute.
Test that the begin function is supported with a string value for the character attribute and a single string component that starts with the string value specified in the character attribute.

local_variable.comment: Applying the begin function with a character argument 'a' to the string 'pple'.
Applying the begin function with a character argument 'a' to the string 'apple'.
Applying the begin function with a string argument 'appl' to the string 'e'.
Applying the begin function with a string argument 'appl' to the string 'apple'.
